menu.title: Digital menu
menu.description: Preview of how your customers see the menu

1.quote: Menoo has transformed how we manage our menu. We no longer have to reprint every time we change something.
1.author: Maria Gonzalez

2.quote: Customers love being able to see the menu in their language. It has greatly improved the experience for our tourists.
2.author: Carlos Ruiz

1.title: Upload your menu
1.description: Import your menu from CSV or create it manually in minutes.

2.title: Generate your QR
2.description: Download your custom QR code or request free stickers for your tables.

3.title: Share and update
3.description: Customers scan the QR and see your digital menu. Update it whenever you want.

1.question: Can I change the menu anytime?
1.answer: Yes, you can update your menu at any time from the control panel. Changes are reflected instantly.

2.question: Does it work without printing?
2.answer: Yes, you only need to print the QR code once. The menu is displayed digitally when customers scan.

3.question: Can I have multiple menus?
3.answer: With the Pro plan you can create unlimited menus. The free plan includes 1 menu.

4.question: How much does it cost?
4.answer: We have a free forever plan. The Pro plan costs €8/month and includes advanced features.

5.question: Do I need technical knowledge?
5.answer: No, Menoo is designed to be easy to use. If you can use a phone, you can use Menoo.

footer.description: The easiest way to create and manage digital menus for restaurants.
